title: Huawei Rumored to Be Working on a Samsung Galaxy Note5 Alternative
text: Earlier this month, we told you that Huawei might be looking to produce a competitor for the Samsung Galaxy S6 edge / edge+. Other companies like Xiaomi and LG have also been rumored to be gearing up towards the same, so it’s no wonder that one of China’s leading smartphone makers is contemplating the scenario.
